head.title: Making It in This New Economy

hedline.hl1: Making It in This New Economy

abstract.p: Jen Sperazza letter disputes September 25 Op-Ed article by Ann L Berrios describing her financial straits in booming economy

block.p: While I appreciate Ann L. Berrios's candor about her financial straits (''No Wealth of Opportunity,'' Op-Ed, Sept. 25), I cannot seem to muster any sympathy for her. Although the new prosperity has not touched my life either, and my financial future seems even grimmer than hers, I do understand something that she obviously doesn't.

While I appreciate Ann L. Berrios's candor about her financial straits (''No Wealth of Opportunity,'' Op-Ed, Sept. 25), I cannot seem to muster any sympathy for her. Although the new prosperity has not touched my life either, and my financial future seems even grimmer than hers, I do understand something that she obviously doesn't.

Judging her neighbors on the clothes they wear and the choices they make for their families will only make her bitter and resentful. She should spend more time counting her blessings, and less time crying over her coffee and pastry.
